generated_description: doer, also known as suzhou duerr oxygen equipment co., ltd., is a private, high-tech enterprise based in suzhou, jiangsu. the company specializes in the research, development, design, manufacturing, sales, and service of various industrial gas equipment and cryogenic equipment. their main products include vpsa oxygen generators, psa nitrogen generators, and gas purification systems. doer holds several licenses, including pressure vessel design and manufacturing licenses, and has certifications such as iso9001 and iso14001. the company focuses on advanced technologies like lithium adsorbent and unique airflow distribution technologies to develop large-scale变压吸附制氧成套技术, addressing challenges in large-diameter shallow adsorption beds. doer serves industries such as chemical, steel, metallurgy, glass, paper, and wastewater treatment, providing comprehensive solutions and technical upgrades to existing equipment.
